name: irrelevance
content:

the fact that something is not related to what is being discussed or considered and therefore not important, or an example of this: Many of these problems may simply fade into irrelevance when the new rules come into force. Sympathy is an irrelevance - we need practical help. They spend too much time talking about irrelevancies, and not enough listening to other people. Opposite
